description.displayText: A hidden gem! Diana is professional, works hard no matter the job, and is always on time. She is a true help. I needed assistance with packing my home due to my health limitations. Diana not only did as I needed, but was creative and organized in taking the tasks at hand in her own way too. I will absolutely look to hire again when it comes time to get my at home business set up. She works throughout the hours scheduled and is very thorough!
